001package com.github.sormuras.bach.command;
002
003import java.io.File;
004import java.nio.file.Path;
005import java.util.ArrayList;
006import java.util.List;
007import java.util.Map;
008import java.util.StringJoiner;
009
010/** An option collecting module source path elements in module-specific form. */
011public record ModuleSourcePathSpecificsOption(List<String> values)
012    implements Option.Values<String> {
013  public static ModuleSourcePathSpecificsOption empty() {
014    return new ModuleSourcePathSpecificsOption(List.of());
015  }
016
017  public static ModuleSourcePathSpecificsOption of(Map<String, List<Path>> specifics) {
018    var values = new ArrayList<String>();
019    specifics.entrySet().stream()
020        .map(ModuleSourcePathSpecificsOption::toString)
021        .forEach(values::add);
022    return new ModuleSourcePathSpecificsOption(List.copyOf(values));
023  }
024
025  public ModuleSourcePathSpecificsOption withModuleSpecificForm(String module, Path... paths) {
026    return withModuleSpecificForm(module, List.of(paths));
027  }
028
029  public ModuleSourcePathSpecificsOption withModuleSpecificForm(String module, List<Path> paths) {
030    var values = new ArrayList<>(this.values);
031    values.add(toString(module, paths));
032    return new ModuleSourcePathSpecificsOption(List.copyOf(values));
033  }
034
035  private static String toString(Map.Entry<String, List<Path>> entry) {
036    return toString(entry.getKey(), entry.getValue());
037  }
038
039  private static String toString(String module, List<Path> paths) {
040    var joiner = new StringJoiner(File.pathSeparator);
041    paths.stream().map(Path::toString).forEach(joiner::add);
042    return module + '=' + joiner;
043  }
044}
